projects.title: The Coffee Brake
projects.description: A JAM stack (Gatsby.js + Node.js/Strapi Headless CMS/PostgreSQL) e-Commerce application that uses Stripe to handle payments.
projects.work: This website is designed using Material-UI and Gatsby.js to create a lightning fast JAM stack application. To process payments, I used Stripe's Payment Intent API which allows for safe and speedy transactions.

projects.title: DevFinder
projects.description: A full-stack (React + Node/MongoDB) application built with TypeScript and Redux Toolkit.
projects.work: The frontend is built with React.js and TypeScript. It comes complete with a profiles page and comments section. The backend is built with Node.js, MongoDB, and TypeScript. There are over 15 API endpoints and the API includes full authentication.

projects.title: ProShop
projects.description: A full-stack (React + Node/MongoDB) application built with Redux and PayPal.
projects.work: The frontend is built with React.js and the react-boostrap component library. It features a full dashboard for an administrator and handles payments securely with PayPal.

projects.title: Crown Clothing
projects.description: A full-stack (React + Firebase) application built with Redux and Stripe.
projects.work: The frontend is built with React.js and Styled Components. The backend is using firebase/firestore for data storage and authentication. Payments are handled with Stripe's Payment Intent API.
